alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 5:16PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...MICROBURST WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MCKINLEY AND SOUTHERN SAN JUAN COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM MDT... At 514 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong microburst winds along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Blanco Trading Post to near Gallup. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gallup, Crownpoint, Nakaibito, Nageezi, Yah-Ta-Hey, Brimhall Nizhoni, Fort Wingate, McGaffey, Church Rock and El Huerfano Trading Post. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 1 and 45. Highway 550 between Mile Markers 108 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Blowing dust associated with strong microburst winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
